title: Strengthening Healthcare Practical Competencies: Student-Centered Capability Analysis Design for Maker Education Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of elementary mathematical concepts and experience with project-based assessment
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate the quality of evidence in mathematical problem-solving processes by analyzing outputs from maker projects.
Learners can provide feedback on peers' maker outputs by applying predefined quality criteria.
Learners can systematically collect and interpret their maker learning outcomes through multi-dimensional evidence (sketches, notes, prototype photos, etc.).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
